article.p: The goal of the inclusion program is to provide, students with disabilities, support in the least restrictive environment, which is the regular education classroom with their peers. Students may receive services through co-teaching, check- in support, or a combination of both.
The primary purpose of the school system’s transportation services is to aid students in getting to and from school in a safe, efficient, and economical manner.
